channel.title: Best item to High Alch
channel.description: I just need enough to get to 70 magic and I was wondering what makes the most profit?

item.title: Best item to High Alch
item.dc:creator: @DannyC DannyC
item.description:
@DannyC wrote:

mr extremez:

Why not use an alching site like scape-xp or something like that… And what i did for 80 was just spammed and auto clicked cammy tele and it costed me 11m from 45.

[quote=“DannyC, post:2, topic:437303”]http://www.scape-xp.com/runescape-high-alchemy.html[/quote]:P

Read full topic

item.title: Best item to High Alch
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:14, topic:437303”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=540011.msg3954387#msg3954387 date=1332613505]
Not pro hunter kit rubbish, best is to do string jewelry. If you must alch, try unstrung symbols. Then again, magic is worthless so there’s no point in getting 99 anyways.
[/quote]String jewelry is slower![/quote]
It is.

Hunter kit isn’t bad. But the cheapest way to get 99 mage (discluding soul wars etc etc) is alching. You can’t even sell hunter kits. You can do air orbs but thats slow as hell. The easy stuff is alching, coverting logs into planks (lunar) etc etc

Read full topic

Why do people alch with loss, it makes 0 sense. Just buy air battlestaves and make money. People sell them in bulk on the forums.

I don’t know why anyone would alch anyway, takes fucking eons to get exp, much better to just make hunter kits.
[/quote]

<3

^ Pro up there, listen to him![/quote]
I would. Except #1, I’m broke, #2 I have no idea how to make a hunter kid. YOUTUBE HERE I COME
edit: Hunter kit is 1 gp so it is a huge loss. Also, It requires lunars which is a bitch quest.

item.title: Best item to High Alch
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well, it used to be (I’m not sure if it still applies now), if you gathered at least one material by hand for yew long bows, you would never lose money. Be it the nature runes, bow string, or yew logs, your profit would never come up negative.

Read full topic

item.title: Best item to High Alch
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Gold coins

Following my logic:

if alch 100 times, and start with 10k:

Solve for X

X = 10,000,000 (10M)

now the first equation:

Gold coins*MageLvl = Gold Coins*x

Input all the data (just say 60 mage):

10,000,000*60 = 10,000X 6,000,000 = X

After 100 alchs you will have 6M.
Repeat for infinite money.

Read full topic
